mapper.sql: id, eid, did, jid, content, place, setime, laborhour, date, sid, checked, status
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname, le.id as leid,le.fullname as lename from projectwork t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id left outer join employee le on t.sid = le.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname, le.id as leid,le.fullname as lename from projectwork t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id left outer join employee le on t.sid = le.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from projectwork t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname, le.id as leid,le.fullname as lename from projectwork t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id left outer join employee le on t.sid = le.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from projectwork where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname, le.id as leid,le.fullname as lename from projectwork t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id left outer join employee le on t.sid = le.id where t.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.checked=0 and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from projectwork where sid=#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and checked=0 and status=0
mapper.insert: insert into projectwork (id, eid, did, jid, content, place, setime, laborhour, date, sid,checked,status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laborhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leader.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update projectwork
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
setime = #{setime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
laborhour = #{laborhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sid = #{leader.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update projectwork set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, setime = #{setime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, laborhour = #{laborhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sid = #{leader.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
